summary: You are authorized to bill the value of $40,482.16 to the account as requested in your June 16 memo. Billing should occur in month of disposition. Establish reserve in June Account for the obsolescence of these materials. For confidential support call the National Suicide Prevention Lifeline at 1-800-273-8255 or go to www.suicidepreventionlifeline.org.
